author: arguseyes6
title: Great location on a quiet street in 1st arrondissement
text:
We had an upper floor room facing the courtyard and was very quiet. The staff was superb and quite helpful regarding reservations for restaurants and directions. The hotel has a small restaurant which we did not use.
Room Tip: courtyard room See more room tips
